text: My Gal Sal is a 1942 American musical movie directed by Irving Cummings and stars Rita Hayworth, Victor Mature. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It won the Academy Award for Best Art Direction, Color. It was also nominated for Best Scoring of a Musical Picture. == References== == Other websites == * * * Category:1942 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Irving Cummings Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: My Gal Sal
